snippet.title: *NEW* Sonic Superstars Mobile (McDonald's Happy Meal Minigame) - Full Gameplay
snippet.description:
Hey everyone, welcome to Sonic Station! Following the Sonic Superstars X McDonald's crossover currently going on in Portugal, a brand new Browser Minigame was made available here for everyone to play! I called it Sonic Superstars - Puzzle Maze (it has no official name). The goal of this minigame is to collect the maximum amount of rings through 5 levels with simple moves. You can play as Sonic, Tails, Knuckles and Amy in their classic forms! Hope you enjoy it!!!

Play Sonic Superstars - Puzzle Maze here :➧ https://www.happymealdigital.com/pt-pt/digital/sc27493/

ATTENTION: This game only seems to work on Mobile Devices (Android and iOS). It does not work on Computers, Smart TVs, Consoles or Android Emulators. The use of a VPN set to Portugal is required to play this game outside of the country!


===Support My Channel===

YouTube (Subscribe):➧https://www.youtube.com/c/sonicstation/w?sub_confirmation=1
YouTube (Become a Member):➧ https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbUUWr59z0rEOBnGvnhJfYA/join
Twitch Channel:➧https://www.twitch.tv/sonicstation
Discord Server:➧https://discord.gg/fXkfHGK
Steam Account:➧http://steamcommunity.com/id/sonicstation/
Dailymotion Channel:➧https://www.dailymotion.com/sonicstation
Donate (Streamlabs):➧https://streamlabs.com/sonicstation

===Become a Member Today!===

Want to monetarely support the channel and get some perks in exchange? Well for less than a dollar or less than a euro you can support the channel and also get access to a text shoutout in all videos, voice shoutout in commentary videos and streams, a sponsor role in my Discord server, the possibility to suggest a commentary video related to Sonic and Extra Videos only for you to watch before anyone else!
Become a Member today:➧ https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbUUWr59z0rEOBnGvnhJfYA/join

Special Thanks to all my members: UltraSonicHero, SpeederLight, SonicDiamond, SonicProductivity, SonicUniverse, SonicRewind, Flames Overdrive, Turma do Luiz, K.T.E.EXE, Mr S. , Brian Geller, Dabtastic, Storm Retro, July 2612 [Julia], Rewind Games and Filemon Lima!


===Other Information===

✪ The Intro Song remix was made by Sir J for DigiValentine's video on Amy Rose. Since I can't find Sir J's social media, check out DigiValentine here: https://www.youtube.com/user/DiGiValentine ✪
✪ The Outro present in these videos was made by the amazing Flaming Fox on Discord ✪
✪ Profile Picture and Banner were made with the help of my good friend Sonic Citadel on Discord ✪


__ılı.lıllılı.ıllı.Thanks For Watchingılı.lıllılı.ıllı.__


This channel is not affiliated with SEGA® or Sonic Team®. The copyrights of Sonic The Hedgehog and all associated characters, names, terms, art and music belong to SEGA® and their respective owners.

⠀⠇⢻⡏⠀⠀⠸⢇⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣧⣄
⠀⢾⣿⣷⣶⣶⣶⣾⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣷⡀
